class_notes: (THIS CLASS IS FULL.  Email candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list) (Prerequisite: NT 501 or equivalent, in particular for those using course to fulfill the NT EE requirement; permission of the instructor may substitute for NT 501 prereq but does not waive the requirement for MDiv students to take their EE after NT 501) ((ON CAMPUS; Wednesday and Friday 10:00am-11:20am; students who hope to take the class via live remote synchronous participation must request permission of the instructor by emailing susan.hylen@emory.edu)
course_description: This course equips students with skills to interpret Revelation for the church today and to evaluate other interpretations.
prerequisites: NT 501 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: WF 10am-11:20am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_252
